title: Credit sale contract violations; penalty
context: §437-37 Credit sale contract violations; penalty. Whoever violates any of the provisions of sections 437-32 to 437-34 relating to sales or purchase of credit sale contracts shall be fined not less than $25 nor more than $1,000. [L 1939, c 258, §20; RL 1945, §7381; am L 1951, c 90, pt of §1; RL 1955, §160-182; HRS §437-37; am L 1987, c 283, §30]
